author: R. Mozingo

review: Great product! Just make sure to check your router compatibility! It does become a pain when your router is not fully compatible as you have to dive into the settings inside your router to make it suitable for CC.Another thing to note is that if you have a low end router, this thing HOGS A TON of your bandwidth, so you end up having devices disconnected. For example, my phone disconnected as i was watching netflix through my CC on my laptop and then i noticed my WIRED router to pc connection stopped working. A restart fixed it all but weird things tend to happen at times when Chromecast is connected.Long story short, make sure your router is top notch and compatible or weird things happen!
author: Armagan Sezer

review: It does what its supposed to do. I can now easily stream Netflix on my TV and I'm able to stream content from the web on TV.
author: Amazon Customer
